entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 30 at 11:24AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Areas of Dense Fog Late This Morning and Afternoon... Through 4 PM, areas of dense fog will reduce visibilities to a quarter mile or less across parts of northeast Iowa, southeast Minnesota, and from southwest into central Wisconsin. This fog will be more prevalent on the ridge tops. As the winds increase during the mid to late afternoon, this dense fog will dissipate.
